nodes.text: A bat-squirrel was a type of creature that was capable of gliding through the air. Members of the sentient Tevellan species, who had thin membranes stretched between their arms and torsos, were able to glide like bat-squirrels.
Bat-squirrels were first mentioned in the canon junior novel Choose Your Destiny: A Finn & Poe Adventure, which was written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019.
